description: Deal 4 to an enemy unit if it has 0 Power. Otherwise, <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> it.
descriptionRaw: Deal 4 to an enemy unit if it has 0 Power. Otherwise, Frostbite it.
flavorText: "When Winter rides across the land, she humbles the strong and fells the weak." - Scarthane Steffen
name: Shatter
